wishes.text: Hi! It has been a while since we saw each other. I was wondering if you would like to catch up on <date> <time> for lunch at <venue>.
Hello members! You are all cordially invited for the monthly team lunch at the <venue> at <time> on <date>
We haven’t caught up in a while. Let’s grab some beers at lunch  <date>? See you at <venue> bar!
You are invited to be part of the team lunch at <time>, <date>, at the <venue>.
I would like to invite you for an afternoon tea at <venue>, <date>, at <time>
Hi, would you be kind enough to take out some time from your busy schedule and have lunch with me <date>? I would like to discuss a business deal with you.
You are cordially invited to a luncheon, at <time> on <date> to celebrate the annual gala at <venue>.
